Theme: Unfortunate Love

column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For all the lovers in the world,
who can break the spell of romance?

column3: 姑娘这是怎么了 冒冒失失的
column6: Madam.

What's going on, Jade?
You almost knocked into me.
Nothing.

column3: 安比槐的事朕没有听华妃的
column6: I didn't listen to Consort Fleur on An Bihuai's case.

column3: 华妃就使了两天小性子
朕也要好好安抚一下她
column6:
She's been having a tantrum for a few days.
I have to do something to soothe her.
I treat you differently from everyone else.
You know that.
Your Majesty, I dare not think that way.

It's just that I still dread to think about
what Yu and Concubine Beauté did.

column3: 你的心思朕何尝不明白
column6: I understand your apprehension.

column3: 其实朕的意思是要晋你为嫔位
column6: I had the intention to promote you to Concubine.
But the duration of your service is relatively short,

column3: 当时又是未侍寝就已经封了贵人
column6:
and your promotion to Noble Lady before any service
was already an exception to the ancestors' rules.
I'm afraid you'll have to settle for this at the moment.

column3: 待来日有孕了才能名正言顺
column6: You'll have a rightful promotion when you're pregnant.
Huan Huan cares nothing about her rank.

column3: 朕的心里怎么会没有你呢
column6: As long as you have me in your heart, Si Lang.
I always do. How can I not?

column3: 朕其实是很舍不得你的
column6: I hold you very dear to my heart.

column3: 六宫这么多人都叫朕不得安宁
column6: I have so many concubines in the harem and they don't bring me peace.

column3: 只有在你这里才能惬意
column6: I can only feel calm when I'm with you here.
Huan Huan understands.

Your Majesty visited Meizhuang.
Does she have a better appetite now?

column3: 还是老样子 一味爱吃酸的
column6:
She's still the same, craving sour food.
[Sour food was believed to help with getting a boy.]

column3: 生个白白胖胖的阿哥才好
column6: When will you have a big chubby boy of our own?

column3: 阿哥才好 公主不好吗
column6: Why does it have to be a boy? Why not a girl?

column3: 只要是咱们的孩子朕都喜欢
column6: I'll love our child just the same.

column3: 皇上万安 莞贵人万安
column6:
Peace to Your Majesty.
Peace to Lady Sourire.
Rise.

column3: 陵容 你这是要往哪儿去啊
column6: I thank Your Majesty.
Lingrong, where are you heading to?

column3: 可巧了 我与皇上也正要去呢
column6: I'm going to see Meizhuang.

What a coincidence!
His Majesty is going with me too.

- Let's go together.
- Yes.

column3: 惠贵人 本宫看你气色真好
column6: Let's go.

column3: 想来这一胎一定平安健康
column6:
Lady Vertu, you look very well.
I believe you'll give birth to a healthy child.
His Majesty the Emperor.
May peace be with Your Majesty.

column3: 今日倒巧 你们都在这儿

column6: What a coincidence! Everyone is here today.
Lady Vertu is pregnant.

column3: 理当多关怀体贴 恪尽皇后职责
column6:
As head of the harem, I must fulfill my duty
and provide the best care for her.
We follow Her Majesty.

column3: 起来吧起来吧 来来来
column6: Rise, rise.
Here, sit down.

column3: 怎么样 今日觉得如何
column6: How are you? How are you feeling today?

column3: 臣妾觉得很好 多谢皇上
column6: I'm feeling very well. I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 臣妾宫中来了位新厨子
column6: Has Your Majesty had dinner yet?

I have a new cook in my palace.
He cooks the best Jiangnan cuisine.

column3: 才在碧桐书院用过晚膳

column6: I had dinner at the Verdant Reading Hall

column3: 想必莞贵人宫中也有好厨子

column6:
I believe Lady Sourire must have a good cook as well
to keep Your Majesty for dinner.

column3: 华妃娘娘宫中的东阿阿胶桂圆羹
已经让皇上念念不忘了
column6:
His Majesty always remembers the
ejiao longan soup at Your Highness's palace.

column3: 如今宫中又来了个好厨子
column6: [from the night when Meizhuang almost drowned]

Now that Your Highness has another good cook,
His Majesty will yearn for Your Highness even in his dreams.

column3: 莞贵人口齿伶俐一如往昔啊
column6:
It's been over a month since we last spoke.
As always, Lady Sourire has a way with words.

column3: 妮子伶俐 年幼爱玩笑
column6: This young lady has a sharp tongue.
Are you going to wage a war of words with her?

column3: 皇上 臣妾喜欢莞贵人伶俐

column6:
Your Majesty, I like Lady Sourire's sharp wit.
I always like to banter with her.

column3: 伊犁将军进贡了一些蜜瓜过来
column6:
Your Majesty, the General of Ili has offered tributary cantaloupe.
Please have some with us.
Of course.

column3: 皇上 是时候该翻牌子了
column6: Your Majesty, it's time to select a name tag.

column3: 不必翻了 朕去皇后那儿
column6: There's no need. I'll visit the Empress.
If you have cantaloupe at your palace, I'll eat with you later.
Yes.

column3: 莞贵人 好好陪陪惠贵人
column6: Lady Sourire, spend some time with Lady Vertu.
Yes.
Who's creeping around over there?

column3: 看见你了 快出来 出来

column6:
- We saw you!
- Come here!
Don't seize me! Don't seize me!
I'm Lady Vertu's maid.

column3: 这不是惠贵人宫里的茯苓吗
column6: This... Isn't this Poria, Lady Shen's maid?

column3: 怎么在这儿鬼鬼祟祟的
column6: Why were you sneaking about?
What are you carrying?
What is it?
Huh?

column3: 想偷了小主的东西夹带私逃
column6: Were you trying to steal away with Lady Vertu's belongings?
What a disgraceful servant! Drag her out and...

column3: 你有身子的人 何必动气
column6: Eh...
You're pregnant. Don't worry yourself about it.
My Lady... Save me, My Lady!

column3: 叫我怎么容你 快去快去
column6: How do you expect me to tolerate you?
Aiya, get out of my sight!
Hold on.
This...
What... what is this?
Blood...

column3: 这 这裤子上怎么有血呀
column6: Why is there blood on these pants?

column3: 难不成是有人谋财害命
column6: Could it be... a rob-and-murder?
That is strange.

column3: 哪有偷东西不偷值钱的东西
专拿些裤子裙子且是污秽之物
column6:
Why would you steal nothing valuable
but some filthy clothes?

column3: 这些是惠贵人的东西吗

column6:
Are these the belongings of Lady Vertu?
Why are they covered with blood?
Is it because... Lady Vertu is having her menses?
I'm not...

column3: 皇上 这丫头古怪得很
column6: Your Majesty, this maid is suspicious.

column3: 臣妾愚见 不如拖去慎刑司

column6:
In my humble opinion, she should be
interrogated by the Department of Penalty.
Look what you've done with your dirty paws.
Take her out and flog her!
My Lady...

column3: 小主 奴婢替你毁灭证据
column6: My Lady,

column3: 可你却狠心弃奴婢于死地
column6: I was destroying evidence for you
but you would ruthlessly send me to death.

column3: 奴婢何必再忠心于小主
column6: Why should I remain loyal to you?
Your Majesty... Your Majesty...

column3: 奴婢再也不敢欺瞒皇上了
column6: I dare not hide the truth from Your Majesty anymore.

column3: 小主她其实根本没有身孕
column6: Lady Vertu... is not pregnant at all.

column3: 这些衣服也不是奴婢偷窃的
column6: Nor was I stealing these clothes.

column3: 是小主前两天信期到了

column6:
A few days ago, Lady Vertu had her "monthly letters"
and stained her pants.
She asked me to throw them out.
These clothes are ironclad proof.
Aiya, Meizhuang...

column3: 皇上 她 她诬蔑臣妾
column6: Your Majesty... she is defiling my name.

column3: 惠贵人受惊 去请太医来
column6:
Lady Vertu had a shock.
Send for the doctors.
Mr. Su,

column3: 请为我去请护胎的刘太医吧
column6:
please send for Dr. Liu,
who has been attending to my pregnancy.

column3: 只是不知道今晚是不是他当值
column6: I wonder if he's on shift tonight.

column3: 今日并不是刘太医当值
column6: My Lady, Dr. Liu is not on duty tonight.
It's all right.

column3: 去请太医院的院判章弥来
column6: Send for the infirmary head, Zhang Mi.

column3: 可是臣妾的胎一直都是由刘太医
column6: Your Majesty, Dr. Liu has always been looking after my...

column3: 无妨 都一样是太医
column6: No matter!
Imperial doctors are the same.

column3: 章太医 究竟什么个情形
column6: Dr. Zhang, what is going on?
Was her prenatal qi affected?
I beg Your Majesties' forgiveness.

column3: 沈贵人她 她没有胎象啊
column6: Lady Vertu...
she shows no fetal signs.

column3: 好好的孩子怎么会没有了胎象
column6: Nonsense!
I have a baby! How can I show no fetal signs?

column3: 许是太医诊断有误也说不定
column6:
Compose yourself, Meizhuang.
It might be a misdiagnosis.

column3: 微臣不是千金一科的圣手
column6: I'm not a specialist in obstetrics.

column3: 还是请江诚江太医一同审定吧
column6: I'd advise that we consult Dr. Jiang Cheng.
Send for him.

column3: 启禀皇上 小主并无身孕
column6: Your Majesty, Lady Vertu is not pregnant.
I wonder which doctor diagnosed her pregnancy.

column3: 这话不对 小主明明月信不来
column6: That can't be true!
My Lady has been missing her menses, feels nauseous and craves sour food.
Aren't these pregnancy symptoms?

column3: 小主应该在前几日就来过月信
column6:
In my humble opinion, Lady Vertu
should have menstruated a few days ago.

column3: 只是月信不调有晚至述象
column6: However, her menstrual cycle has been delayed and irregular.
This should be the effect of certain medicines.

column3: 要过一张推迟月信的方子
column6:
A few months ago, Lady Vertu asked me
for a prescription to delay her menstruation.

column3: 说是月信常常不调 不易得孕
column6: She hoped to adjust her menstrual cycle for a pregnancy.

Although I was hesitant, Lady Vertu said
she was doing it for the imperial family.
So I had to provide the prescription.

column3: 至于小主为何呕吐爱食酸
column6: As to nausea and her liking for sour food,
I do not have any information.

column3: 皇上 臣妾是私下问江太医

column6: Your Majesty, I did privately ask Dr. Jiang for a prescription.

column3: 但是此方是有助于怀孕

column6:
But I wanted to prepare myself for
pregnancy, rather than delay menstruation.
Your Majesty, I've been wrongfully accused!

column3: 白纸黑字一看即可分明
column6: Show me the prescription.
We'll see the proof in black and white.
Lunar,

column3: 妆奁盒子底层的方子拿来
column6:
take out the prescription from the
bottom drawer of my dresser box.
Your Majesty,

column3: 臣妾知道私相授受事犯宫规
column6:
I understand that private receipt of
prescriptions is an offense in the palace.
I beg for Your Majesty's pardon.

column3: 可比假孕争宠的罪名小多了
column6:
Indeed, but it is a minor offense
compared to feigning a pregnancy for favor.
My Lady, it's not there!
Don't bother!

- Su Peisheng.
- Your Majesty.
Bring Liu Ben here immediately.

column3: 他要是敢延误立刻绑了
column6: He'll be tied up if he dares to hesitate.

column3: 刚才奴才去请江太医的时候
也顺道命人去请了刘太医
column6:
Your Majesty, when Your Majesty summoned Dr. Jiang,
I sent for Dr. Liu as well.

column3: 可刘太医的住处早已人去楼空了
column6: But his residence... had already been vacated.
Very well then.

column3: 沈贵人 他是你同乡对不对
column6: Lady Shen, he is from your hometown, isn't he?

column3: 他是你举荐的侍奉龙胎的对不对
column6:
It was you who recommended him to
attend to your pregnancy, was it not?
Your Majesty...

column3: 谁敢替沈氏求情 一并同罪而视
column6: Anyone defending Shen will be convicted of the same offense.
Your Majesty...

column3: 皇上 莞贵人与惠贵人一向交好
column6: Your Majesty, Lady Sourire has always been close to Lady Vertu.
I wonder if she was...
Silence!
May peace be restored in Your Majesty.
You deceived me and the Empress Dowager.

column3: 你还敢戴着这个簪子招摇
column6: Don't you dare flaunt her hairpin!

column3: 皇上 保重龙体要紧哪
column6: [It was a disgrace for women to unfasten their hair publicly.]
Your Majesty, your health takes priority.
I have always appreciated your stable personality.

column3: 不想你却是如此的不堪
column6:
I would never expect you to
commit such an unspeakable crime:
trying to gain favor with a feigned pregnancy.
I am extremely disappointed.
Your Majesty, I've been wrongfully accused.
I truly have been wrongfully accused!

column3: 皇上 臣妾与姐姐一同长大
姐姐是何为人臣妾再清楚不过了
column6:
Your Majesty, I grew up with Meizhuang
and can vouch for her character.

column3: 也请皇上念在姐姐素日悉心侍奉
给她一个改过自新的机会吧
column6:
If she has erred, I entreat Your Majesty to consider her
attentive service and offer her a chance to redeem herself.
I beg Your Majesty to reconsider.
I beg Your Majesty to forgive Lady Shen.

column3: 惠贵人只是太急切想有子嗣罢了
column6: Lady Sourire is not wrong.

Lady Vertu was only too eager to have a child.
I hope Your Majesty will take account of her past service.

column3: 贵人沈氏 言行无状
column6:
The Noble Lady surnamed Shen
has committed indecent acts.

column3: 着降为答应 褫夺封号
column6:
She is to be demoted to Companion,
deprived of her honorary name
and confined to the Leisured Moon Chamber.

column3: 不得朕令任何人不得探视
column6: No one can visit her without my permission.

column3: 请皇上示下 那刘畚与茯苓二人
column6:
Your Majesty, please enlighten us
as for what to do about Liu Ben and Poria.
Capture Liu Ben, alive.
As for Poria,
death.
Meizhuang...
How could this happen?
How could this happen, Coua?

column3: 姐姐的事情会不会连累到我们啊
column6: I'm so scared. Will this affect us?
Don't worry, at least Lady Sourire is still here.
Go quickly...
this...
burn this immediately!

You've been embroidering this for several days.
Are you sure you want to burn it, My Lady?

column3: 皇上现在正忌讳假孕的事情

column6:
Anything related to her feigned pregnancy
will be taboo for His Majesty.

column3: 我们岂不要大祸临头吗
column6: We would be in dire trouble if it were discovered.
Go, go quickly!
My work is done. Give me the money.
Of course.

column3: 五千两银票 够你花半辈子了
column6:
Five thousand taels.
It should be enough for the rest of your life.
Count it before you go.
I'm afraid this will only last six months for me.
What? Liu Ben escaped?

column3: 娘娘息怒 奴才已经派人去追了
column6:
Your Highness, quell your anger.
I've already sent people in pursuit.

column3: 刘畚知道我们太多事情
column6: Kill him immediately upon capture.

Liu Ben knows too much about us.
By no means is he to remain.
Yes.
Your Highness.
Rise.

column3: 茯苓的家里人都安排好了吗
column6: I thank Your Highness.
Has Poria's family been taken care of?
Yes, Your Highness.
They have been amply rewarded and sent beyond Rehe Province.
Very well.

column3: 这件事若办不好 她全家都得死
column6:
I made it clear to Poria that
her whole family would die if she failed.

column3: 本宫也会保她一家子荣华富贵
column6:
But I promised her family a lifetime of wealth,
even if she had to die to succeed.

column3: 娘娘圣明 茯苓能为娘娘而死
column6: Your Highness is wise.

Poria has died a worthy death
to serve Your Highness and to protect her family.
You may leave.
Here he is.
Mr. Zhang!
Peace to Companion An.

column3: 张公公 您昨儿答应我们的
column6: Thank you, sir.

column3: 把我们小主的四个包袱带回娘家
column6:
Mr. Zhang, you agreed yesterday to
bring My Lady's packages to her family.

column3: 这不我们准备好了 有劳公公
column6:
We've brought the packages.
Thank you for your help, sir.

column3: 姑娘啊 实在是不好意思
column6: I'm truly sorry, Miss.
I'm afraid today I cannot fulfill the promise I made yesterday.

column3: 可是二十两的盘缠不够您使吗
column6: May I speak to you privately, sir?

column3: 若是这样 我回去再凑给您
column6: Is 20 taels not enough for the trip?

column3: 小主啊 一夜的工夫
column6: If so, I will gather more for you, sir.

column3: 许多事情都天翻地覆了
column6:
My Lady, in the course of one night,
Heaven and Earth have completely changed.
Lady Vertu is now Companion Shen.

column3: 奴才我实在是不敢送了
column6: I do not dare to send these packages for you.

column3: 您怎么能说话不算话呢
column6: Mr. Zhang! Mr. Zhang!

column3: 好歹现在咱们莞贵人也还在呢
column6: How can you go back on your word?
At least Lady Sourire is still there.
I'm not going back on my word.

column3: 谁搭上沈答应都是个忌讳
column6: Anyone associated with Companion Shen is taboo.
Why would I risk it?

column3: 再说了 沈答应都倒了
那莞贵人能不受连累吗
column6:
As for Lady Sourire, she won't remain unscathed
when Companion Shen has fallen.

column3: 也是兔子的尾巴 长不了
column6: In my view, it won't be long: like "the tail of a rabbit".

column3: 好了 公公 您就直说吧
column6: All right, sir, tell me the truth.

column3: 要怎样才能送到我母亲手里
column6:
What do I have to do
to have the packages delivered to my mother?
If I get to keep half the items.
Be careful. Go quickly.

column3: 这个 还有那个 快点
column6: This one, and that one. Hurry.

column3: 这些都是我宫里的东西

column6:
These are my palace's belongings.
Why are you taking them away?

column3: 安答应 咱们娘娘说了
您是跟着沈答应进来的
column6:
Companion An, Her Highness said
that you entered here with Companion Shen.

column3: 本不应该住在这么好的屋子里
column6:
According to your rank, you do not deserve
to live in such an ornate room.

column3: 不过啊 如今娘娘开恩

column6:
But, by the grace of Her Highness,
you don't need to move to another residence.
As for the decorations here...

column3: 也配不上用这么好的东西
column6:
you have no use for them,
nor are you worthy of such possessions.
Her Highness instructed me to move all of them away.

column3: 正好 这几个奴才的屋子里呀

column6: And since these servants' quarters aren't well-decorated,
they can use yours!
(Eunuchs: Let's go.)

We've had an earful of Companion Shen.
(Song Zhi: Is everyone ready? Let's go.)
What did we gain when she was in favor?

column3: 如今成了答应 人人踩一脚不说
column6:
Now that she's a Companion,
everyone not only tramples on her,

column3: 还得拉上我们 什么世道
column6: but kicks on us.
What kind of a world is this?

column3: 别说了 知道就行了
column6: That's enough. Keep it to yourself.

column3: 小主 您还在这儿呢

column6: Aiyo, you are still here, My Lady.
Please go.
The wars in the Northwest are tense.

His Majesty has spent all his time at court
and the Governance Hall for the past few days
reading memoranda or meeting ministers.
I'm afraid His Majesty doesn't have time to see you.

column3: 多谢苏公公提醒 我再等等
